org.dolan.searcher

Class AsyncSearchDown

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dolan.searcher.AsyncSearch
      • org.dolan.searcher.AsyncSearchDown
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    class AsyncSearchDown
extends AsyncSearch
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The Class AsyncSearchDown. It is a Task which will be ran by another Thread. Specifically, it will be ran by the ISearcher. It is used to search a file from top to bottom.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.dolan.searcher.AsyncSearch

        amount, callback, pattern, reader
